Traits.Name: Static Field
Traits.Content: The Electronic Golem has an electric aura that creates a static field within 10 feet of it. Any creature that starts its turn within this radius takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

Traits.Name: Tangled Wires
Traits.Content: The golem can use its action to create a zone of tangled wires in a 15-foot radius. Any creature that enters this area or starts its turn there must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The Electronic Golem makes two attacks: one with its Shock Tendril and one with its Wire Snare.

Actions.Name: Shock Tendril
Actions.Content: Melee Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) lightning damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Wire Snare
Actions.Content: Ranged Attack: +5 to hit, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) damage. On a hit, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be restrained until the end of its next turn as the wires entangle them.

Actions.Name: Electrical Surge
Actions.Content: The Electronic Golem releases a surge of electricity in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This ability can be used again after a short or long rest.
